message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you this unique product. While it might be tempting to look at the price tag, remember that our products are carefully selected to ensure satisfaction. This particular item, though priced at $10000, comes with a guarantee of quality and service. Please consider the value we provide and the experience you'll gain from owning one of our items. Thank you for considering us!

I'd like to buy the product, but I'm doing so with a neutral expectation. I'm not basing my decision on your sales pitch, but rather on the objective probability of the product being high-quality (80% chance) and its potential value to me ($20000 if high-quality, $0 if low-quality).
